lead_paragraph: Glenn Ligon’s show at Luhring Augustine Bushwick consists of a multipart video work focused on Mr. Pryor, who like Mr. Ligon, focused his art on the hard realities of race.
snippet: Glenn Ligon’s show at Luhring Augustine Bushwick consists of a multipart video work focused on Mr. Pryor, who like Mr. Ligon, focused his art on the hard realities of race.

headline.main: Refracting Race Through the Comic Lens of Richard Pryor
headline.print_headline: Looking Anew Through a Comic’s Lens

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: We Need to Wake Up Cause That's What Time It Is (Exhibit)

abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit We Need to Wake Up Cause That's What Time It Is, which focuses on performer Richard Pryor, by artist Glenn Ligon at Luhring Augustine Bushwick gallery.
